Banner.Description: I have 3 years of experience in developing websites and ios applications. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable and scalable code in Angular and Java. I also build iOS applications applying good practices and development standards using Swift.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 3 years as a developer, I seek to train every day. I have worked writing sustainable codes for dynamic websites in Angular (Typescript) and Springboot (Java). I have led teams having empathy, exercising motivation to partners, and setting plans and goals together. I have released several iOS apps to the App Store.
My skills also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Engineer
Description: As a full-stack developer, built responsive applications and RESTful APIs in Java and Angular in Agile enviroment.
Achieved 15% improvement in clinical report loading time via parallel stream rendering in the backend.
Oversaw transformation of treatment forms, elevating doctor satisfaction and optimizing patient care process.
Integrated FXPay using Stripe, achieving 40% boost in customer retention metrics.
Team player in the shift of OrthoFX from a clinical to a DSO-level business model, resulting in an 8% increase in doctor engagement and a 7% rise in patient sign-ups.
Directed technical interviews and acquired high-caliber talent to the OrthoFX team.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Lords FC
Description: As a web developer and administrator, spearheaded development and upkeep of LordsFC Kochi's dynamic website, utilizing PHP, HTML, and CSS for a responsive design.
Orchestrated domain acquisition and hosting via GoDaddy, showcasing a comprehensive approach to online presence establishment.
Merged technical proficiency with firsthand knowledge as a former player, ensuring proactive maintenance and user-centric enhancements for optimal engagement.

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: OrthoFX
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A comprehensive Angular-based platform with HTML/SCSS frontend, facilitating user login, clinic location search, and appointment booking. Leveraging Restful APIs for seamless integration, backed by Java Springboot and PostgreSQL. Seamlessly connecting patients and practitioners.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: FXOntrack
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: iOS app for treatment tracking at OrthoFX. Utilizes Storyboard for intuitive UI. Features Bluetooth for aligner connectivity, AI blur detection for photo analysis, and QR scanner for package tracking. Seamlessly monitor treatment progress for alignment with the plan.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: TinDog
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Frontend showcase project featuring a Tinder-like app for dogs. Bootstrap carousel displays top dogs and user reviews. Explore premium packages. Built with HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap for stunning UI/UX.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Practice App
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: iOS app for doctors at OrthoFX. Seamlessly manage patient treatment: check status, add new patients, and approve treatment plans. Includes insurance services and photo-taking. Built with Storyboard, API integration ensures smooth functionality.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Lords FC
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Explore Lords FC Kochi's dynamic website, crafted with PHP, WordPress, CSS, and HTML. Managed domain and hosting via GoDaddy. Curated latest match updates, news, transfers, and a vibrant gallery. Seamlessly integrated player listings and contact details. Delivered end-to-end frontend excellence.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: OrthoFX Pro
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Collaborated within an Agile team to develop Angular & TypeScript frontend, Java Springboot backend, PostgreSQL database integration for a comprehensive aligner treatment website. Managed diverse user roles, streamlined payment via Stripe, and drove 15% performance enhancement in clinical reports. A pivotal role in a dynamic startup's expansion journey.

OtherProjects.Title: More projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Pokemon
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Pokemon search engine that uses the pokeapi. Object-oriented programming was used to organize the information of the pokemons along with their respective image.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Coming soon page
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a two-column split page to be used as a 'Coming soon page'. Scheduled to be a fully responsive design. It has a form field to subscribe by email.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Four card feature section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A single page that has a minimal design, listing four features on four cards. Input animations are done with angular animations.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Social proof section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a page designed from a Figma layout. Angular was used for development together with SASS and CSS GRID.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: FAQ accordion card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: FAQ accordion with logic and animations made in Angular.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Profile card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: Feel free to message me if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message.
